Description:
A convenient lifestyle for starters.
Offers a brand new bathroom and so much more!
Positioned within a well-established neighbourhood and only moments from schools, shops and public transport, this low-maintenance residence offers a superb opportunity for the first-home buyer, retiree, downsizer or investor.
Beyond the brick-veneer exterior, the simple yet smart floorplan offers a comfortable and effective home for the family. Neutral tones throughout help to reflect light into the interior, which develops an inviting feel, while newly polished floorboards create a sense of organic warmth.
Natural light filters into the spacious lounge, which also boasts split system heating/air-conditioning. The nearby kitchen features a stainless steel gas stove and dishwasher, electric oven, generous cupboard and bench space and large pot drawers. Wall-to-wall spaciousness in the kitchen provides ample room for multiple cooks and offers convenient access to the dining area.

Two bathrooms perfectly service the needs of a busy family, showcasing a brand new bathroom incorporating large format floor-to-wall tiles, shower and stylish vanity. Other highlights list as; space-saving Euro laundry, storage cupboards, high ceiling, external canvas awning, shed and remote single garage. Set behind a tall front fence, the private yard is accessible through double gates and provides a great space for children, pets or parking.

With only two homes on the block and boasting street-front advantage, your search for a new beginning has finally ended.
